nodes.text: New Bornalex was an Outer Rim planet that was aligned with the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars. Cyl Sant and her daughter Rystáll were from this world.
During the Serenno theater of the Outer Rim Sieges, Jedi-led fleets assaulted this world and Ord Radama in an attempt to attack the Separatist strongholds of Celanon and Serenno.
The planet's name was intended as a Tuckerization of Star Wars fan Alex Newborn.
